#TITLE Flowers Blooming in the Church
#ALBUM Final Fantasy VII
#COMPOSER Nobuo Uematsu
#ARRANGED Gi Nattak
#TRANSCRIPTION OST midi

#WAVE 0x21 0x0A ## oboe (FF6)
#WAVE 0x22 0x20 ## marimba (FF6)
